name: Frantic Farming (Cody Miner, adamgack, dan_j_gonzalez, kade-d)
name_original: Frantic Farming (Cody Miner, adamgack, dan_j_gonzalez, kade-d)
description:
Description:

Defend your base against hordes of enemies! Harvest crops to buy new defenses.

How To Play:
  • Left click on an item to select it
  • Right click to place an item on the grid
  • Middle click to sell an item on the grid
  • Press space bar to start the round
  • Press E to toggle the shop on and off
